sen.e: By the way, although in costume dramas, kimono of the common people are stock example that with black collars, this fashion came out from the last days of Tokugawa Shogunate, thus it is strange that this fashion appears in the drama "Mito Komon" where setting of the time is Genroku era.

By the way, although in costume dramas, kimono of the common people are stock examples with black collars, this fashion came from the last days of the Tokugawa Shogunate, thus it is strange that this fashion appears in the drama "Mito Komon" where time is depicted as the Genroku era.

Incidentally, although in costume dramas, kimono of the common people are stock examples with black collars, this fashion came from the last days of the Tokugawa Shogunate, thus it is strange that this fashion appears in the TV drama 'Mitokomon' where time is depicted as the Genroku era.
